name: PowerBots Builders
description:
Have you been on the hunt for an action-packed, never-ending couch multiplayer game? Look no further! Join the PowerBots team in building space stations, assisting friendly robots, and fending off enemies. Take back the PowerStones to save the Universe from grave danger!

This game is made for relaxing! Our single-button building feature makes it easy for anyone to start creating space stations and blowing up robots. The ongoing events keep gameplay interesting and the variety of game modes ensure there's always a way to switch up your gaming session. You can race your friends to the finish or join forces to reach the end goal together. Come join the party and pick up the game that's already becoming a classic indie title.
